title: Extension of African American rights- description

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a way that African Americans continued efforts to extend rights and liberties in the twentieth century?

choices.label: Artists and writers of the New Negro movement adapted European norms in their work.
The Freedmenâ€™s Bureau was established to help formerly enslaved people transition to citizenship.
Civil rights groups organized the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom.
Millions of African American families relocated to northern and western states during the Great Migration.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
